definitions.text: a search for an alternative that meets cognitive criteria
examples: life is more than the pursuance of fame

definitions.text: the act of searching for something

examples: Things that die with their eyes open and questing
The animal came questing through the forest
The dog went off and quested

definitions.text: bark with prolonged noises, of dogs
seek alms, as for religious purposes
express the need or desire for; ask for
examples: She requested an extra bed in her room
